nodes.text: dossier BXLH: Les mutants dans Star Wars

dossier BXLH: Les mutants dans Star Wars (English: file BXLH: The mutants in Star Wars) was a roleplaying adventure published in issue 23 of the French gaming magazine, Graal. It gave tips on how to roleplay mutants that were found in the galaxy, as well as statistics for several of these mutants.
